name: simple-php-cs-fixer
description: A simple way to fire php-cs-fixer with custom config and optionally on save.

simple-php-cs-fixer.executablePath.description: The path to your php-cs-fixer, which could be a script that exposes this via docker exec.

simple-php-cs-fixer.useConfig.description: Whether to use a custom config file

simple-php-cs-fixer.config.description: PHP CS Fixer custom config file name

simple-php-cs-fixer.hostPath.description: This is your project path from your host machine - use in combination with dockerPath to 'replace' filename path.

simple-php-cs-fixer.dockerPath.description: This is your project path from within your container

simple-php-cs-fixer.save.description: Run PHP CS Fixer on save

simple-php-cs-fixer.usingCache.description: Whether to use the php-cs-fixer cache

simple-php-cs-fixer.rules.description: A comma separated list of rules php-cs-fixer will apply using the --rules option
